title: The Staybridge Suites Brand Inspires Spontaneous Summer Travel for Vacation Starved FamiliesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
The Staybridge Suites Brand Inspires Spontaneous Summer Travel for Vacation Starved Families Published on : Tuesday, July 14, 2015
InterContinental Hotels Group (IHG), one of the world’s leading hotel companies, today announces the Staybridge Suites brand’s Family Weekend Getaway contest – part of the Long Live Long Weekends campaign encouraging American families to hit the road this summer. According to a recent study by Oxford Economics 1 , 59% of employees believe taking their earned time off work improves their family life. That’s why the Staybridge Suites brand, in collaboration withTraveling Mom, is sending three vacation-starved families on a spontaneous long weekend as part of the Family Weekend Getaway contest.
Robert Radomski, Vice President, Brand Management, Staybridge Suites® and Candlewood Suites® Brands, IHG said: “For many, the fondest memories are created during family vacations, but for some parents who are always on-the-go, it’s difficult to plan a summer getaway with the kids. Through the brand’s Family Weekend Getaway contest, families will get to experience a well-deserved getaway and enjoy the spacious suites and fully equipped kitchens at Staybridge Suites hotels – the ideal accommodations for families while away from home.”
The three winning families of the Family Weekend Getaway contest have the opportunity to discover destinations that are just a road trip away. Families receive everything they need for a long weekend getaway including: a three night stay at a Staybridge Suites hotel, a $250 MasterCard® prepaid card 2 , a $50 Amazon gift card and a Kindle Fire HD 7 to capture family photos and videos of travel memories that will last for years to come.
Between July 14-27, 2015, participants who share their stories on why they deserve a long weekend family getaway will be entered to win. Kim Orlando, Founder of Traveling Mom and family vacation expert, will help IHG select three winning families from all of the eligible entries.
Kim Orlando, Founder, Traveling Mom said: “I’m thrilled to collaborate with the Staybridge Suites brand for this contest because it shows families that you don’t have to travel far to enjoy a vacation and reconnect. Many families, including my family of five, are looking to get away before school starts and with Staybridge Suites properties, families can enjoy a last-minute trip at a great value.”
There are two easy steps to enter the Family Weekend Getaway contest:
1. Visit Staybridge.com/FamilyGetaway and click on “Win a Family Vacation Getaway”
2. Share why your family would deserve a long weekend in 1,500 characters or less.
Family Weekend Getaway is part of the Staybridge Suites brand’s Long Live Long Weekends campaign. From now through September 30, the brand is celebrating the family road trip, hot breakfasts and all of the hotel room forts that go with it. The Staybridge Suites brand gives families all the comforts of home to have a seamless and fun vacation.
